scripts.watch: export DEVELOPMENT=true && nodemon loader/server.js --watch output/Server*/**/* --watch output/Shared*/**/* & webpack --watch --progress --config webpack.development.config.js
scripts.build-production-server: rm -rf output && spago bundle-app -m Server.Main -t dist/production/server.js
scripts.build-production-client: rm -rf output && spago build --purs-args '--codegen corefn' && zephyr -f Client.IM.Main && zephyr -f Client.Landing.Main && zephyr -f Client.Login.Main && zephyr -f Client.Profile.Main && zephyr -f Client.Leaderboard.Main && zephyr -f Client.InternalHelp.Main && zephyr -f Client.Help.Main && zephyr -f Client.Settings.Main && zephyr -f Client.Recover.Main && rm -rf output && mv dce-output output && webpack --progress --config webpack.production.config.js
scripts.build-production: rm -rf dist && npm run build-production-server && npm run build-production-client && rm -rf output
